title: My name is Nick Ford and I run a site called AbolishWork.com, AMA!
body: hey everyone  i know this is on short notice but i saw that some of you have shared my content and thought it'd be good to connect with the  presumably  fine folks at this subreddit   if you have any questions about me concerning work  what sort of pizza is the best or anything else feel free to comment below   if i discover that this is too short of a notice for an ama then i'll come back in a few weeks and try again in 2015     ama   edit  of course  now  of all times  aw com has decided to mess up  it's safe to view as far as i know but give it time for things to be patched up   final edit  it's 3 33 am and a little over 12 hours since i started this ama  with 20 comments  a bunch of them being mine of course  but with such short notice i am fairly happy with how this went   i'll be sure to come back in a few months and do another since you guys seemed to enjoy it  and next time i'll give a bit more notice     thanks for everyone's time

title: Hey Nick
body: how do you define  work  i have followed you on facebook and been trying to figure it out  i could easily strawman here and go on about say's law and whatnot  but your definition is the most important thing to understand here
